website_summaries.verdict: A wide 13-inch nozzle means you can cut down on cleaning time.
pros: Edge-cleaning bristles get into tight spaces
Comes with Hoover SpinScrub technology, making it an efficient cleaner
Users love how dry it leaves carpets
cons: Users say the clean water tank can leak if not situated perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Hoover Carpet Shampooer
customer_reviews.text: 11/9/20178 - Bought this 07/08/2016, used very little. Owned a bit over a year,The machine leaks all over the place. The rinse setting still leaks soap through the machine into your carpet so you never get a real rinse, you get a carpet full of soap. This is the 2nd one of these ive owned, last one lasted 3 years - the same thing occurred. Once it starts leaking water all over and soap into the rinse only setting - its all over - throw away and buy new. Very cheaply built - very poor quality. DO NOT BUY this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Schmo Did

customer_reviews.title: Vast improvement over steamvac; seems to work well so far.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. we had a hoover steam vac. What I like about this over the steamvac is that the trigger controlls are electronic, the upholstery attachment seems to be deigned better. We've used this many times since it arrived (3 dogs, 2 cats, and a toddler) to clean messes, and to generally clean our carpets. One thing I do note is that the cleaning solution does seem to mix inside the water tank, at least to some degree. It seems to be lighter than the steamvac, and is built differently. I'm still concerned about the longevity of this machine over time. It's almost all plastic and the power cord seems to be flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH THE FLIMSY FRAMEWORK... DOESNT HOLD UP.
customer_reviews.text: ive used it twice. first was fine... noticed the bracket holding hose would come loose easily... i added velcro straps (bright green to match) so the hose bracket would stay in place. then the second time i used it the full water tank came tumbling off the unit and broke the handle on top. I still had carpet that needed rinsed so i got the water tank to stay in place...again with velcro strap. but the water tank coupling leaked profusely now i have large water spots on my carpet.... i am very disappointed with this product... its cleaning power was good at best but the unit is so flimsy...
customer_reviews.author: Lady da Vinci

customer_reviews.title: The Hoover gets Them Clean
customer_reviews.text: The Hoover will get your rugs clean. That is a fact. It will also need a new motor in 5 years, so that is what you should expect. This is my second one, and all the spare parts from the first one fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several months now and this thing is a life saver - we recently got a puppy and potty training is not going very well. I clean my carpets with this fairly regularly and have had no issues. We also have an older dog that sheds a ton and I have had no issues with the brush heads breaking as other people have mentioned. Yes it requires routine maintenance and you have to clean the dog hair out of it, but that kind of goes without saying. It comes apart really easily to clean as well, takes maybe 5 minutes to clean it all out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I have been very disappointed with this carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have been very disappointed with this carpet cleaner. I have only used it about 5 times throughout its life in the past 3 years due to always having a new problem with it. - After first use, the water tank was leaking. Thankfully, Hoover replaced it for free. - The carpet scrubbers stopped moving after third time. - The hose started leaking around 4th time - The button on the hand hose broke at the 5th time - Plastic button piece broke at 5th time This is the lowest quality item more than 100 dollars I have ever used. I cannot believe the poor quality control on this.
customer_reviews.author: Inphinity

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this machine cleans the carpet but I'm really disappointed in the quality of the unit. Too many cheap plastic parts that are brittle and break easily. The detergent dispenser leaks and the unit is somewhat bulky and clumsy to use. This is the 2nd Hoover product we have purchased that was not up to the task. I guess the Hoover quality of my youth is now nothing but a memory.
customer_reviews.author: Guncoach

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.text: Barely got thru using it throughout the house once before the sprayer quit working. It cleaned quite well till that happened. Cleaned the brushes. Re-assembled, etc. Couldn't get it to spray again and when it was left upright (and off), the rest of the solution and water leaked out causing a mess. Pretty disappointed and since i had discarded the box, I'm unable to return it. Previously owned a Bissell which lasted quite a while. I really liked the brush design on this and thought I'd give it a try. What a complete waste of money for something I used almost once and broke. Didn't even get to clean the entire house before it quit.
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shampooer
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased with this vacuum. I've owned 3 Bissells and the pump for the water/shampoo stops working. I've taken them in for repairs and 2 months later, it stops working. The Bissell was always difficult to take apart to clean as you need a screwdriver. the Hoover is so easy to clean and take apart - I was right in love. And the rinse cycle is awesome, which the Bissell did not have that feature either. and the price of the Hoover was a bit cheaper than the Bissell and a way better machine by far. I hope my Hoover will outlast my Bissell.
customer_reviews.author: Judy R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Hoover is not what it used to be, hate this cleaner, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this carpet shampooer 3 times. The first time a part that held the canister in place fell off and i had to purchase a replacement with took several months to get. The handle for the top tank broke in half and i have to use a bungee cord to hold it on and it leaks everywhere. I researched to replacement part and i would have to pay $40 for the kit rather than just for the part. Hoover has gone down hill and is made very poorly. Save your money, do not buy this carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good but not Great
customer_reviews.text: I like that this machine has good suction but it has some draw backs that I think that hoover needs to redesign on this unit. 1# the brushes fall apart after 8months of use 2# The plastic construction that the unit is made of will cloud up on you. Could be better quality of materials 3# The motor will go and you really need to read the fine print on your warranty for this unit, they make you pack it up and ship it back to them at your cost!! So make sure you really read the fine print but I wouldn't not ay not to buy this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Mastroni

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for many years now and it works well. It's not a miracle worker but it is easy to use and a fairly quick way to freshen carpet and/or remove stains. The color of the dirty water will be eye opening. This is not a low profile machine- storage is my biggest complaint, but that would be the case with any of these I imagine. Overall, I have no complaints with performance.
customer_reviews.author: KFlick

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to give this machine any less then 5 stars because it is the best carpet cleaner I've ever owned. I've had this cleaner for at least 9 years and still works great never have had a problem with it. Here is the little white lie, I never used it on stairs cause I don't have any and I never tried it on my hardwood floors. If your just looking for a great carpet cleaner you found it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: The water tank leaks *update tighten the screws
customer_reviews.text: works great but the little spring valve leaks water all over the floor and unit, you have to move quick to avoid getting water all over the floor and machine. It doesn't seem to leak once loaded into the vacuum, but until you get it in there its a race. Buy the extended warranty. Update: Tighten the screws at the bottom is f the fresh tank and it will stop leaking
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cavender

customer_reviews.title: Worst carpet cleaner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Worst carpet cleaner I have ever used. First the tanks dont stay in place and falls out smelling water all over the place. Second it leaks water down into the machine which in turn burns out the motor. I've only used this machine 3 times in the last year and a half that I've had it because it constantly fails. Then when you call customer service you have to pay for parts because the warranty doesn't cover everything on the machine and by the way to get it serviced you have to drive an hour and a half. Really! I live in a big city. I wouldn't waste my money. Skip this one and keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dealing with the realities of dog ownership (sigh)
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cleaner for nine months now, and it's kept me sane with two dogs (including a puppy who went through a very slow journey to being housetrained). It's very easy to use, cleans a nice wide path, and most importantly, it has very strong suction. Suction is absolutely the key to carpet cleaners, otherwise you're simply leaving dirty water in the rug and inviting mold and mildew. With this cleaner my 10' x 12' area rug is dry overnight, even if I do several passes of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 4 star review because when we received the item there was a broken clip piece off of the hose that was thrown in the bag with the hardware however, the company was prompt in replacing it and sent us a whole new hose assembly. I used my shampooer for the first time yesterday and my carpets look brand new! I am very happy with how well it sucks up debris, I have animals so I was very pleased with how well and deep it cleaned the carpets. I was also expecting for it to be heavier based off other reviews but it really is a light machine.
customer_reviews.author: Caiti Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It works great on carpet
customer_reviews.text: It works great on carpet. The handheld wand, not so much. I tried to use it to clean the carpet in my car. It didn't spray liquid very well. The second time I went to use it, I was rolling it on its back wheels. When I stopped, the heavy water container on top flew off and hit the floor. The handle had snapped in two. I tried calling Hoover twice for a replacement, no response. An email response said I could call in and order the part. Very disappointed in their customer service. Since I used it only once, and its 6 months old, it should be under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Randy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carpet cleaner for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for removing stains from carpeted surfaces. Simple to fill, simple to empty, and easy to use. I will say however that the tank leaks if you do not keep the carpet cleaner completely upright. For example, if you carry it up the stairs at s slight angle, it will leak water out of it. I have checked both take several times and they are sealed properly. Overall a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Coty Walters

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for hard floors.
customer_reviews.text: I have light colored, very textured, ceramic tile floors. Wet mopping leaves dirty water to dry in grooves and grout. I purchased a Hoover Floormate because it sucked up the dirty water after scrubbing. I borrowed my daughters Hoover Carpet Cleaner to clean my two area rugs. I realized it works the same as my Hoover Floormate, but is much more powerful. It also is wider and gets to the edges better. It is wonderful on my tile floors. Scrubs and removes the dirty water leaving them almost dry. Although it says carpet cleaner on the machine, the instruction book refers to using on hard surface floors.
customer_reviews.author: Mer’s music

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should, very heavy device
customer_reviews.text: The price is amazing on this. It arrived undamaged. I've had this now for about a year, and for some reason the compartment for the soap leaks so I can't use that and need to put the soap directly into the water tank. It is a pain in the butt to take on stairs as it is very bulky. The attachments work great. I have pets and children and stains do come up easily. It also comes apart easily so the device can be cleaned. This is a very heavy unit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Saari

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My first shampooer was another brand and broke within the first 30 days. This shampooer does an even better job for the same price. I don't like how you have to completely switch between the floor brush and spot cleaner, but other than that I love it. Putting it together was a little difficult, the instructions weren't exactly accurate, but I managed. I looked at several and decided on this one for the price. I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Klobie82

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately it was still under warranty
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly constructed. Second time I used it, the spinner snapped and the brushes would not rotate. Had to find a service center to repair it. Fortunately it was still under warranty. This is the tenth time I have used it since it was repaired and the same thing happened. I have approximately 500 square feet of carpet, which should not really tax the machine. Unfortunate, because it does a great job when it is functioning. Into the dumpster with this piece of junk. No more Hoover products for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Zenobi

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and trips the breaker, won't work more than 10 times.
customer_reviews.text: We had this carpet shampooer for almost 2 years, but it was only used a handful of times before it completely stopped working. Every time we turn it on it trips the breaker and won't run. Definitely a wiring issue. Also leaks, and you would think a machine meant to handle water would be well sealed or well made to protect wiring from water damage. What a disappointment. 😓
customer_reviews.author: Scott J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carpet cleaner to clean shag carpet. A recent professional cleaning cost me over $100 and this product was clearly a value if it worked well. It did!! The carpet feels and looks cleaner than the professional cleaning. It was easy to assemble, the self-mixing cleaner was excellent, and the cleanup was a cinch! This was a great decision and I am proud to say it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Appliance with a Runny Nose
customer_reviews.text: I would give this device 5 stars if it were not for a couple of details. As you are vacuuming, not all of the liquid from the carpet, gets sucked into the reservoir. Some is stranded in the nose and, when the device is switched off, drains out; be careful where you park it after use. Additionally, the cleaning fluid reservoir can leak if you store it with solution in the tank. I have to remove the cleaning solution tank and park the appliance in the garage when finished. It cleans great and with just a few uses has definitely paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ahoro Blethends

customer_reviews.title: A well designed and excellent perfoming machine.
customer_reviews.text: The first Hoover Carpet Cleaner Max performed so well cleaning the two adjacent summer homes I own that I purchased a second one as a gift for a friend. While the instructions for the use of the machine seem a bit daunting, never fear, because YouTube has a number of tutorials to make you most comfortable in the use of the machine. The machine does an excellent job of not only cleaning the carpets but also in extracting the water and cleaning solution used.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine. I had a Bissel and you couldn't rinse the carpet until you put clear water in. This machine you wash do a few passes over the dirty area then rinse. It's a very powerful machine compared to the Bissel. I like the two holding tanks and the separate holder for the detergent. It's easy to use the buttons for on and off and rinse and wash are right at the top of the handle within your thumbs reach. The only bad thing is that is water dribbles out as you're going to the area to be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: quiltmakerTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Good.... BUT!
customer_reviews.text: It's great when it works, but since I have had it, I have had to replace the handle on the tank 3 times! It's annoying to be almost through and the handle breaks! It's the handle that holds the water & detergent. Other than spending more $$$ on replacing handles, it's a great carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: SissyOKC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean reasonably thoroughly, and we are so happy. This thing probably saved our vintage paneling when our 1970 ranch-style house flooded. We would have had 4-5 inches of water, but my husband had this thing going nonstop, sucking up the groundwater, dumping it out, probably 30 of the intake buckets from our sunken living room. It also saved our remaining carpet when my mom accidentally dumped half a quart of trim paint on our hallway carpet. It also makes the cutest little dog hair coils to pick up off the carpet after cleaning (if your vac doesn't pick it up well enough)!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not a "Buy Once" Product
customer_reviews.text: It worked fantastic for us for about 2 years. Then the big scrubbers started not working and then quit. I looked for a belt or something to replace but never was able to find one available on their parts list nor was I able to locate the belt inside the main assembly (they have it pretty well sealed up). So I have used the hand tool for the past several years, instead. Well, the trigger for the water finally died about 4 months ago and it continuously sprays water unless I take the water tank off. The replacement hose is about $60. So I will be buying a new cleaner .. and probably switching brands.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gasaway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent on pet accidents
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one. I wore my first one out. I had ordered 2 replacement tanks for my first one and I would keep using it, but I finally broke a piece of plastic off that I did not think I could replace. Excellent on pet accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing carpet cleaner!!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this carpet cleaner!! I used this cleaner on my high traffic area carpet and it worked wonderfully! Only had to go over it once and you could see it cleaning the dirt out of the carpet instantly. Love all the features that is on this shampooer and was very easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Berber Carpets Look Great
customer_reviews.text: This machine gives professional results combined with Hoover PetPlus 2X solution. Simply fill Cleaning Solution tank and separate large tank with clean water. Follow instructions with 2 wet passes and 2 dry passes and move to the next section. The most difficult part is cleaning the tanks and spin brushes after but that is not that difficult, just necessary if you want this machine to last. It leaves my Berber Rugs that are light tan clean. Dog stains are gone. The dirty water tank will prove what this machine takes out of the carpets. My wife was very happy with the results which is a bonus. I think this is a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: JNick

customer_reviews.title: Alot of other shampooers were good at putting water down but had poor suction which ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used lots of different carpet cleaners over the years & I must say I was very impressed with this particular model. Alot of other shampooers were good at putting water down but had poor suction which means the carpwts were just wet n dirty... But the hoover max extract dual v got excellent suction so the floors not only getting the dirt up, look cleaner but the carpets completely dry within 30 minutes whereas with my other carpet cleaners the carpets would be wet for hours due to it not sucking up as much water that it put down. Its definatley not a miracle machine but for the money its a excellent choice, I couldnt be happier :)
customer_reviews.author: jaime shertzer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.text: After reading way too many reviews, I decided to purchase this one. I am not sorry! It did a fantastic job on my 18 year old carpet. It doesn't look brand new, but it does look nice and clean. I used the Hoover Pet Plus shampoo, because I have pets and all the reviews recommended it. It works great, even though I don't really have a pet stain problem, my girls use their boxes all the time and never get sick. I had no problems with leaks at all. It work wonderfully for me. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Completelyglutenfree

customer_reviews.title: Leaks, leaks, leaks...
customer_reviews.text: This could be a good product, but its poorly designed. This is my 3rd time buying one of these and they always seem to leak after a few months. I ended up buying the Hoover power scrub deluxe and thus far find it not only cheaper, but easier to use and handle. It cleans just as well (if not better) than this model.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner for the money on the market.  Made to last.
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these from years ago. I could not believe how light and cheap the other models Hoover and other brands were making now. Thanksully I found this model still being made and grabbed it up without a thought from my previous experience with it. Our old one must have lasted several decades with many family members using it along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This was my first shampooer to own. I have heard a lot of bad experiences from people that have bought and used other shampooers but this was at a good price and I needed one because my dog and cat like to make messes on my carpet. This is very easy to use and works great. I followed the instructions: vacuumed prior to shampooing, made one "wet" pass, then two "dry" passes. It removed several old stains from my carpet and exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: AllDayJ28

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: Used twice since purchase. I thought my rugs where at best semi clean. This machine proved me wrong. They were very dirty. Machine is slightly heavy to use, but most of the weight comes from the amounts of water in the tank. I do wish the top tank was less difficult to fasten on. Sometimes it seems to work just fine, others it can be stubborn. Considering the cost of the machine and the job it does cleaning I believe I got my money's worth with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hildebrandt

customer_reviews.title: love love.
customer_reviews.text: love love.. this is perfect and did an amazing job. It draws out most of the water,little dry time, has a quick flick of a button rinse, too ! It mixes the soap and water for you, it does everything except push itself around.. easy to clean out, easy to fill.. love love !
customer_reviews.author: Ajaey

customer_reviews.title: This carpet cleaner worked so well for about 9 months ...
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner worked so well for about 9 months, and then it broke. All of the sudden, the scrubbing brushes just stopped working (which has been said by a few other people, too). I tried, with no avail, to fix it on my own. Thankfully, I had purchased the extended warranty. Because of the problem with the brushes, I was able to receive refund on my purchase of the carpet cleaner. This is why it received 3 stars. It worked so well until it didn't.....and I need something that lasts for several years in this house (lots of kids and animals).
customer_reviews.author: Heaker

customer_reviews.title: It's Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. After researching a vast selection of shampooers and reading customer feedback I was a tad worried about what people wrote that it leaks, it does not. My guess is that they probably attached the container incorrectly, wasn't completely seated possibly. The amount of dirt this picked up is beyond words. I bought this about 2 months after I had Sears come out and supposedly clean my carpet, it seems that they left a lot behind. I'm happy with my purchase and I will do it myself the right way.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Kid

customer_reviews.title: Top tank doesn't lock in very well. Even when it's "locked" in.
customer_reviews.text: As someone else said, the top tank doesn't secure well. It popped out and fell on floor, cracking the handle. Hoover can't replace handle. Also, the unit leaks a bit. Everything is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lander

customer_reviews.title: Terrafic Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cleaner for 10 months and I use it a lot. I have very flat carpet and it always cleaned very well. However, one week ago it was not spraying the solution out it was sort of just squirting. Darn, the brushes were not rotating. Took of brushes and found the shaft the brush knob goes into was not turning. Called Hoover, they gave me a repair shop very close to me. Fixed, repaired, and working great. The repair shop said this is a VERY common thing. My third HOOVER and would buy again. There is no way to prevent this from happening, but Hoover Co. was so very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Baron

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box and Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in damaged box! Pictures attached. No doorbell was rung and no box or padding around the vacuum what so ever. There are missing parts to vacuum we discovered once we were practically completely done. Very frustrating experience! Was very much looking forward to this carpet cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Do not like this product
customer_reviews.text: I uses this for my living room carpet. The attachment I tried to use on my couch and chair, but as soon as it would have contact with the furniture the attachment wouldn't spin so it did not clean well at all. Also the attachment for the water and carpet cleaner does not stay attached well along with the clips for the dirty water container to hold it in place broke after I used this product the second time. I bought in January and have used it twice and regret wasting my money.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: this is a piece of garbage. don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: this is a piece of garbage. don't waste your money. it is flimsy. once you put the water in the fist tank it begins to seep and leak out of the machine. junk junk junk i never even go to start your engines because it was leaky and flimsy. the tank that holds the fresh water barely stays hooked in place where it belongs. run far run fast and do not purchase this heap of junk. i would not even use it to start a fire.
customer_reviews.author: andrew biar

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Great Cleaner...I have never owned a upright cleaner and this met all expectations. I do have a very expensive carpet cleaner as well. Only problem with it.. My back is never the same after using it. I hurt for days. With the Hoover I don't hurt at all. It cleans my carpet and I am very pleased with the machine. Can't go wrong by buying this machine. Shipping was even faster then expected. I got the machine 3 days earlier then I was suppose too. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: It Really Does a Great Job !  I Was Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Big Surprise - It really did a great job on our carpets. Use hot tap water for best results. I never thought these units really did anything as compared to a professional, but with this unit I was wrong. It seems like the more you clean the carpet, the better the results. We thought we would have to re-carpet our house before the house went up for sale but this cleaner worked so well, the carpet looked great - no need to replace the carpet. Lots of money saved. We have always used the Hoover "Professional" cleaner so I can't comment on the cleaning results using the Standard Hoover cleaning solution that came with the cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Garage Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: brand new out of box tried for fist time
customer_reviews.text: pulled out of box assembled put soap that came with unit into soap holder and the soap pump did not work at all brought it to service center for warrantee repair and they say that the soap was leff in it for to long and hardened up in the pump this was confusing becuase i opened it and tryed it for 30 seconds and on the first use of soap it never worked beware of this product the repair guy thinks thay shipped a rebuilt but it looks new no marks on wheels nothing
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hill

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It certainly does the job it was purchased to do, It sucks the nasty crap out of my carpet. (Evidenced by the disgusting brown water I poured out of it) I have a house full of animals plus 3 kids, this thing is going to get a lot of use. The only negatives I can think of are that it weighs a ton, even dry. My 12 year old has trouble getting it up and down the stairs. (Not really the device's fault, I just thought I should mention it.) The "power" attachment with the rotating brush is pretty much worthless, I don't foresee using it. The plain suction wand does just as well as the power one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Hoover Max Carpet Cleaner is like using an upright vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This Hoover Max Carpet Cleaner is like using an upright vacuum cleaner, so easy and effortless. The clean water tank fills easily with warm tap water and cleaning solution. The dirty water tank is easy to remove and empty. But the best thing is that this device really cleans the carpet and sucks up the water. My carpet was completely dry within hours. Full disclosure, this Hoover Max replaces an old canister style Bissell "steam" cleaner, which was a huge pain to use and left my carpet wet for days. I guess the only downside to Hoover Max is that now I have no excuse not to clean the carpeted areas more often.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this cleaner. It does a great job cleaning (even old fruit punch stains that have been there for who knows how long)! It seems to extract well. I does seem to go through a lot of cleaning solution, but I have never owned my own cleaner to compare. My only complaint is I wish the clean water tank was a little larger. I had to go fill several times throughout cleaning. Easy assembly, but unless you are planning to use the hose immediately, do bother attaching as it just gets in the way. Great product and kudos to Amazon for awesome customer service and answering all my concerns immediately prior to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Swan

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Getting ready to replace this one with a Rug Doctor. Way too many issues with the Hoover. The upholstery attachment broke the first time I used it, the tank leaks like a sieve, the clean water tank doesn’t always release water when the button is pressed. With pets, I need something durable and reliable and this machine is neither of those things.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey N. Green

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaner.. my first one lasted over 10 years. Bought an Amazon Warehouse one with no warranty and had to take it apart to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: trailmug

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, got more than I expected in a quality carpet shampooer at a great price! Thank YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: cleaning fluid tank leaks
customer_reviews.text: cleaning fluid tank leaks sec machine and it did it again would not go for 3rd machine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best carpet cleaner I've used to-date!
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 animals (3 dogs, and 2 cats), so we often have to clean the carpets to keep them looking good and home deodorized from pet smells. This machine has it all, great cleaning capabilities, good suction (carpets were dry in no time), easy to use fill and dirty containers. It isn't too heavy, and has great attachments for cleaning our stairs and couches (when needed). Definitely would recommend this to a friend, or anyone else who would listen. The last two carpet cleaners we've had were Bissle brands, and this Hoover kicks their tushes hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna S.

customer_reviews.title: I have had the worst kind of traffic the last ten years
customer_reviews.text: Have used the Hoover twice now; my carpet is almost stain free. I have had the worst kind of traffic the last ten years: dogs, cats, dribbling senior cit (myself) and toddlers to name a few. I had just about decided the carpet had to be replaced as some stains (cat yak) are close to impossible to remove. The Hoover Max has managed to remove almost all of the stains. It has removed all the soil from the traffic pattern areas. It is easy to use; which is a blessing as I am a physically limited 73 yr old. I am hoping it lasts as long as my Hoover vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: krziktz911

customer_reviews.title: Some issues-probably inexperience
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once but all over the house. The rugs really are nice and clean. I have learned I need to rinse more than once. I have also learned that when attaching a full clean water tank it is best done in the shower because if it doesn't go on the first try there is water everywhere! Mind you, this was the first time and experience could improve my odds with connecting on the first try. I also had an issue with the dirty tank dripping a little when it is turned off. i would still recommend it, though, because the carpet is really clean and that is what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Cate Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It cleans very well even on very gross, dirty carpet! I bought a house and the carpets now look almost brand new. The very heavily soiled parts I had to go over that area a few times slowly but it got it all out. The only thing I don't like is the spot where the machine pulls the water and the cleaner out of the container holds the fluid there and when you tilt the machine back to empty the dirty water it goes all over. It isn't a huge amount but enough to get annoying after a while. Other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: With 4 dogs and a white (yes, white!) carpet in the family room, I had given up hope of ever making it look clean again. The previous owners of the house weren't exactly clean, so I started off with a disaster. Before biting the bullet and replacing the flooring, I gave my new Hoover a try. To say it looks better is an understatement! Not only did it take out the stains left after numerous attempts with other cleaners, but it was dry and ready to walk on in less than 2 hours! I love this machine and recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Clean!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty getting the water tank on correctly, but once I realized that I needed to rock it into place, by putting the middle indicator into the slot on the bottom, it worked great! The cleaning was superior to the other 'brands' that I have previously had. It's rinsing action was very thorough and was key to long lasting cleaning...I can't tell you how excited I am to have this in my cleaning arsenol! Greatly recommend this to every home!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the upholstery cleaning which never worked. It never released the water sprayer which continues to flow and soak furniture. I have used it less than ten times and parts of the brittle plastic are snapping off randomly. The clamp that held in the recovery tank snapped off and then of course the seal is broken and will not suck up water. This is my second Hoover product and it will be my last. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline A. Crane

customer_reviews.title: A "No Brainer"
customer_reviews.text: For years now I have rented the "Rug Doctor" at various rental centers and supermarkets. A modest amount of labor over several hours produced a superior end-result for a modest price particularly as compared to the so-called carpet cleaning companies. Finally, I grew tired of lugging it home and back and up and down the stairs. I saw this item, on sale, at Amazon, and reasoned that I could own it for the equivalent of 2 1/2 rental payments. The quality of the end-result is just as good if not better than that of the Rug Doctor. The downside is that the holding tanks require more frequent attention, nevertheless, I am more than delighted with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joseph k harrison

customer_reviews.title: Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST carpet Cleaner on the MARKET - Did a good job for five years - Bought a new one just love it very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I just love this cleaner .My carpets have never looked so good .its so easy to clean after use and the water holding tank is so large no need in constant running to refill .best ever
customer_reviews.author: Ora Britton

customer_reviews.title: No spinning brushes after 2 years of very light use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product 2 years and in that time it's only been used a few times to pick up spills and maybe once a year to do the living room and bedroom carpets. Very light use. Maybe 1 container of cleaning solution put through it. The brushes no longer spin. Nothing is visibly broken, the slot that turns the brushes internally spins freely when twisted with a screwdriver but does not spin with the motor running. My guess is the butterfly valve or air supply are broken so the turbine doesn't spin. Very disappointing. Would be 1 star if it didn't clean reasonably well.
customer_reviews.author: Kodack

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..last one caught fire though
customer_reviews.text: So far so good..cleans great. My last hoover .the dual force..caught fire and I had to buy a new one. I hope this one works longer than the three months I got from the other one. I have 3 kids and 3 dogs..my carpets take a beating. I need this one to hold up...and not catch fire. If it does...back to hoover it goes with a nasty review on every customer site I can find . This thing is a beast! And cleans like nobody's business...so far I love it! :) crossing my fingers no sparks fly this time hoover....
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Michelle Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Turn it on and turn it out!
customer_reviews.text: Given my OCD for cleanliness and yen for dogs, I needed my very own steam cleaner. I got sick of those Groupon deals that brought a guy over to upsell the Groupon. Over it. This bad boy gives me complete control to wash whatever troubles I got into magical beauty. This is worth every penny. Please read the instructions, I got a bad habit of not doing so. It works perfectly when used as advised or when my partner cleans for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Ann Houston

customer_reviews.title: ONE BIG PROBLEM FOR SOME PEOPLE & WHO CARES FOR OTHERS
customer_reviews.text: I have used it only one time in one bedroom. Appears to work quite well except for the cleaner dispenser. The dispenser dispenses extremely small amounts of cleaner fluid into the water. Very, very ineffective. I started mixing the cleaner fluid directly into the water and it worked fine. However this negates the use of the "Rinse" function. So it's kind of a catch 22; you're damned if you do and you're damned if you don't.
customer_reviews.author: K. KALEB WAYNE WILSON

customer_reviews.title: hulk child could opperate
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly in a few pieces but put together easily. Due to the set up it is a bit heavy when the clean water tank is full, so if you have shoulder or back issues you may need to find something else. Good luck finding something that works just as well and so simply though. We have a young child, 2 dogs, 2 cats and husband works on jets so we get a lot of dirt traffic despite not wearing shoes in the house. After 3 years of living in our house the carpets had a lot of wear and after one use they were fluffy and bright again. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Genesis M. Cranston

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carpet cleaner to replace another one by another manufacturer. This Hoover is far superior to our old carpet cleaner. It does a great job of removing pet stains and spills from our old carpet making it look nearly new again. We have central vac in our house but also have a Hoover vacuum cleaner for those days when you just don't want to pull out that long hose of the central vac so I was familiar with the Hoover product and their reputation. The carpet cleaner lives up to the Hoover name.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with a Hoover
customer_reviews.text: I had owned and used the predecessor to the carpet cleaner for many years before the motor finally gave up the ghost. I was pleased with the performance of the old one although the functionality of the resevoirs, especially the return tank, was overly complicated and I thought the brush action weak. Both of these problems were addressed with this machine and in addition it is more powerful than before. I have no complaints for this carpet cleaner, the performance is outstanding, I especially like the separate resevoir for the detergent meaning no more mixing in the clean water tank. The operation is simple and easy to use. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for The Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product in the past but had a friend break it so was glad to get it thru Amazon. I feel it is one of the best residential Carpet Cleaner/Shampooer being sold today. Yes you can spend more money to get an industrial rated machine but this one is more than efficient for the average home owner......my opinion. P.S. As with all tools cleaning and maintenance is a virtue!!
customer_reviews.author: David L. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is wonderful. We have white carpeting. We have a room with exercise equipment. A few years ago I lubricated a machine with graphite/silicon lube. It dripped on the rug, and I spent the last few years trying every kind of spot lifter and cleaner immaginable. This machine did what I thought was impossible. The spots are gone. It took about 4 cycles (as recommended in the instructions) but it did the trick. After each cycle, an improvement was appearant. Read and follow the instructions and be very pleased. Our 8 year old white carpeting looks like new; maybe better.
customer_reviews.author: Fannish

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Price!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a month and love it so far. Everyone has asked to borrow mine. I used a Bissel machine before this - and this is so much easier to use. The hardest part is hooking up the hose, but it just snaps in. I like that the dirty water has it's own container, not a "bladder". I also love that I don't have to worry about mixing the soap...it has its own container, and has an auto mix feature. I've cleaned my couches, floors and even my mattress with ease. It seems to dry fast too. Good Machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine. I purchased it when it was around the 160 mark so it was a great deal. It pulls out a ton of water so the carpets dry quickly. My elderly dog has been regularly failing to make it outside on time and this shampooer was able to pull out those stains. I picked this one over a similar Hoover machine in the same price range because it stated that it left the carpets drier - and it does exactly that. Overall I think it's a good, easy to use machine in the right price range for the average family.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I got this cleaner today and so far it works pretty good. I'm not blown away by it, but it does the job. My carpets look cleaner, but could probably use another clean to get back to new looking shape. The only thing I don't like about this cleaner is that it feels really cheap! Some parts are made out of really cheap flimsy plastic. Another issue I have is that I'm pretty sure it came without one of the tools. I'm calling Hoover tomorrow to see if they can send me replacement parts for free, otherwise I'll have to return it to Amazon and order a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Joe

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got the item in 2014, and it works great ever since. It is powerful and quiet easy to maneuver. I use it after vacuuming the carpet. It is strong enough to pick up what's still hidden. The down side is the weight, which could be problematic if you need to carry the machine upstairs. And it produce high pitch noise, so make sure you get a set of ear plugs. But at this price point, the overall quality is impeccable.
customer_reviews.author: J.Y

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: We've only used our Hoover carpet cleaner once, but it performed very well. We had an older Hoover model that we used for many years when we had pets. That machine was bequeathed to our daughter who has two dogs and two cats. We decided we needed a new machine to keep our new carpet in showroom condition. We are very pleased with the improvements Hoover has made over the years since we purchased our first unit. The separate tank for the cleaning solution allows adding clean water and/or solution as needed. We recommend Hoover carpet cleaners, especially this model, highly.
customer_reviews.author: K. C. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Was missing 2 nuts & 2 bolts, when received. Contacted the seller, the missing parts were delivered in 48 hours. Very pleased with this product. Does an excellant job at cleaning carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Two broke within 3 years
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner was amazing when we were able to use it; however, a few months after owning it, the handle on the solution tank broke. We haven’t even had it a year! The one we had before this, the motor burned up. Probably going with a different brand this time as we don’t feel like spending money just to have it break a short time later.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Was going to buy this from Kohls found it on Amazon about 30 bucks cheaper. Bought the professional strength cleaner with it. Used it on my carpets and did my mothers, it did a fantastic job. Ours had just been done by a smaller Bissel that I wanted to replace as it was small and took forever to clean large rooms, the Hoover removed alot of dirt from the carpet that the other missed. Attachments are not as great as main machine but it may be me being new with them may get better with time, they do serve their purpose though.
customer_reviews.author: nkyguy

customer_reviews.title: Cleans GREAT! But NOT Built to Last!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs and a lot of foot traffic. As far as cleaning goes, it's the best, I have no complaints! However as to quality of parts, it's cheaply made. I'm on my fourth in 18 years - The first lasted 10 years. The last purchase lasted only 2 years and 2 months. This time it was the motor, last time it just stopped vacuuming up the water. I use the cleaner about 8 times a year, so roughly 17 uses and it died - but while it worked, the carpets looked new every time!
customer_reviews.author: Sm

customer_reviews.title: cleaner
customer_reviews.text: only used once for couch but did not work well, maybe I did not have set up right I do not have stairs
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a workhorse. We had an old [ 22 yr old] Hoover similar to this, but without the rinse feature. It finally wore out, so we chose another Hoover, and we are so glad we did. It really gets the carpets clean, and the rinse feature assures the remaining cleaning solution gets pulled out, leaving carpets amazingly clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: This has proven to be a very worthwhile investment.  Does its job, and well!
customer_reviews.text: We got this cleaner for a few immediate and specific needs, which it completed with ease. We’ve used it a few times since, and have been very pleased with it. It is a bit heavy, but I think most cleaners of this type are (at least those reasonably priced). We have no complaints with this cleaner, and have been very pleased with the performance it’s capable of delivering. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Mnemonic

customer_reviews.title: It works great but some parts can't be replaced
customer_reviews.text: I had one similar years ago and I loved it. This one I used less than a hour. Took the water tank out filed it and put it back on. Ran the cleaner one more time. Went to put it in the upright position and the water tank feel out and the handle broke. The handle is not included with a new tank. Also the handle has been discontinued. The ones available on eBay are 45$.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Hard to carry and tank always falls off, broke
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a very hard time carrying this machine. And most often times when I pick it up, by the top handle, the tank falls off. Eventually the handle of the tank broke off and now it won’t snap back together so it doesn’t work. Used it a handful of times and now it’s useless. The part is unavailable for reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Sayles

customer_reviews.title: serious dirt pick up
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this, a pipe broke underneath my sink this was amazing at picking up all of the water in the kitchen and along the carpet at the living room border. After that, I used it in heavy traffic areas near the door, and the amount of dirt that came out of my carpet was horrifying. The ability to suck up the excess water is also amazing, I've never experienced cleaning a carpet that dried so fast. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate in Carpet Cleaning and Easy to Clean Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Hoover and Bissell carpet scrubbers over the last 35 years. This is the utlimate in carpet scrubbers. I like the seperate wash and rinse cycle. The way the scrubber comes apart to clean is amazing. The rotating brushes pull out and snap in for easy cleaning. The front face snaps off to clean any dog hair or dirt left under the cover. Before all of these parts had to be screwed off and on. I cleaned two rooms of carpet on one tank of water. Finally Hoover has gotten it right.
customer_reviews.author: schwartzdesigns

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Great on large areas however smaller clean tank and water reservoir.. however it truly cleans nicely
customer_reviews.author: William Toney

customer_reviews.title: I actually liked how well this unit performed and it's simplicity of ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked how well this unit performed and it's simplicity of use . Key is using the correct cleaning solution and not allowing the solution too foam when sucking it back into the recovery tank . I'd tell you the secret but what fun would that be for you !...
customer_reviews.author: Man of Carbon

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, we used it often. After a few years we replaced it with the same model.
customer_reviews.author: James D. King

customer_reviews.title: Turned out to be junk
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner is a big disappointment I bought it on March 15th 2018 I have used it only 4 times it leaks water all over the place and the Hoover brand Shampoo foams up all over this morning the part that holds the bottom tank broke off I would i a replacement or my money back a big disappointment I alway thought that Hoover was a great brand
customer_reviews.author: Steve Helmace

customer_reviews.title: Less bo with mo
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy but cleans like a pro. Water contains large amount of water so you can do alot without running back and forth. The soap dispenser hold enough for alot of work
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: I was fan or Hoover products and vacuum cleaner also bought of Hoover but customer support is poor. Service center also takes fo
customer_reviews.text: From first wash itself spin brush stopped working and from customer support same self try trouble shoot information provided again and again. I was fan or Hoover products and vacuum cleaner also bought of Hoover but customer support is poor. Service center also takes for ride. Instead of Amazon buying such products from Retail shop is better at least one will get attention. Or I strongly feel through Amazon these people push defective products.
customer_reviews.author: ROHIT

customer_reviews.title: My second Max Extract
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful carpet cleaner. I gave my first one to my daughter-in-law after 3 years and ordered this one from Amazon. I was so disappointed when it arrived. I set it up easily, filled the shampoo and hot water dispensers and prepared to clean my carpet. Turned it on and absolutely NO POWER to the machine. I plugged it into 2 other outlets and still no power. Will return it and pay more to purchase it locally. I will also say that it was evident that the cleaner had been opened previously and now I believe it was already returned once.
customer_reviews.author: hikerbee
